name: Cube Droid Saves the Galaxy
storyline:
Play as Cube Droid and head out to steal energy from invading forces on six planets, each with six challenging levels.

Your mission: liberate the planets and kick out the bad guys.
summary:
Play as Cube Droid and head out to steal energy from invading forces on six planets, each with six challenging levels. Your mission: liberate the planets and kick out the bad guys.

Cube Droid, inspired by Sokoban and Eggerland Mystery, offers a fun world of captivating puzzles to lose yourself in. Prepare for an out-of-this-world-journey that will challenge your mind!

videos.name: Announcement Trailer
videos.title: Teaser for the upcoming MSX game Cube Droid
